    The client has a history of severe allergic reactions after a previous dose or to a vaccine component"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions""Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"

concept.code: The client has a history of severe allergic reactions after a previous dose or to a vaccine component
Seasonal influenza vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Do not vaccinate client with seasonal influenza if client has had a severe allergic reaction (e.g. anaphylaxis) after a previous dose or to a vaccine component.
